mapper.sql: MSG_ID, MSG_TITLE, MSG_CONTENT, MSG_START_DATE, MSG_END_DATE, MSG_PUB_TIME, MSG_PUB_USER_ID, MSG_TYPE, MSG_ATTACHMENT_ID, MSG_IS_VALID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED
mapper.insert: insert into t_message (MSG_ID, MSG_TITLE, MSG_CONTENT, MSG_START_DATE, MSG_END_DATE, MSG_PUB_TIME, MSG_PUB_USER_ID, MSG_TYPE, MSG_ATTACHMENT_ID, MSG_IS_VALID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED ) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgPubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msgPubUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgAttachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgIsValid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} )

insert into t_message
MSG_ID,
MSG_TITLE,
MSG_CONTENT,
MSG_START_DATE,
MSG_END_DATE,
MSG_PUB_TIME,
MSG_PUB_USER_ID,
MSG_TYPE,
MSG_ATTACHMENT_ID,
MSG_IS_VALID,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_TIME,
IS_DELETED,
#{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{msgEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{msgPubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{msgPubUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{msgAttachmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{msgIsValid,jdbcType=BIT},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.select:
SELECT
from t_message WHERE 1 = 1
AND MSG_ID = #{msgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MSG_IS_VALID = 1 AND IS_DELETED = 0
